name: Adventure in the mountains
summary: Experience the thrill of mountain climbing.
description: Join us for an unforgettable adventure in the mountains. Suitable for experienced climbers.

name: Safari in Africa
description: A guided safari tour through the African savannah. Perfect for wildlife enthusiasts.

name: City tour in Europe
summary: Discover the beauty of European cities.
description: A cultural tour through the most beautiful cities in Europe. Ideal for history lovers.

summary: Relax on the beautiful beaches of the Caribbean.

summary: Immerse yourself in the rich cultures of Asia.

summary: Experience the vastness of the desert.

summary: Explore the depths of the rainforest.
description: A challenging expedition through the rainforests of South America. Ideal for adventure lovers.

summary: Hit the slopes in the beautiful Alps.
